name: The Last Meal of Winnifred
description:
A Game of nonsense for Ludum Dare 46.

Winnifred is hungry. They're pretty sure they're the only being left on earth. Can you keep them alive until they eat their final meal?

Use the mouse to arrange objects and help guide Winnifred to the food.

Handmade by Rusty Jim Games:

@RustyJimGames

Emily Morton - Painting

Adam Crawford - Computer stuff

Helen Dockery - Concept and Testing
